channel.title: ClassicReloaded - PK based server | Custom areas & quests | Only combat skills
channel.description:
[b][u]ClassicReloaded[/b]
[b]Release date: [/b]22th july [b]Online players peak: [/b]33 [b]Forums: [/b][URL=http://z7.invisionfree.com/ClassicReloaded]http://z7.invisionfree.com/ClassicReloaded[/URL] [b]Client: [/b] [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?b56kvagq2bb1b2x]http://www.mediafire.com/?b56kvagq2bb1b2x[/URL] [b]Youtube: [/b] [URL=http://www.youtube.com/user/ClassicReloaded#p/a]http://www.youtube.com/user/ClassicReloaded#p/a[/URL]
Me and Brian wanted to make a classic private server that is purely for pking. However we didn't want everyone to have their desired stats in few hours. Ever tried pking in private server where its easy to get flats and rune armor costs practically nothing? it gets really boring after a while.
The xp rates arent as slow as rsc though. It took about 1 week for our first player to get max combat.
The gaming area has been changed a bit. A river now blocks most of the world. Leaving only edgeville and wilderness available for players. Most of training spots are located in wilderness. There is a few in edgeville though for those who don't wish to get killed during training (wilderness ones are way faster though).
We have added new area to wilderness as well. its called Dragon Lair. Few different types of dragons habitat this place. We are planning on adding more stuff to wilderness later on.
You will start out with basic gear and lots of pking supplies. Only thing you need to work for is armor, high level runes and arrows.
We have released a new skill called Slayer. Some people might know this from rs2. It works pretty much the same way.
Features:
- Wilderness Switch - Skills go up to 150 - Noncombat skills removed - Slayer skill - Dragon Lair & Pickham (New areas in wilderness, use portal to access) - Teleport and skill spells removed - Custom quests - Logging & teleporting with ammy requires you to stand still for 10 seconds - Combat formula tweaked - Portals
The Labyrinth quest! [IMG]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/4517/screenshot2ahb.png[/img] Dragon lair [IMG]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/5166/newdragonlair.png[/img] New bosses [IMG]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/7961/commanderzilyana.png[/img] [IMG]http://img409.imageshack.us/img409/3092/inchhigh.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img340.imageshack.us/img340/8742/storeo.png[/img] [IMG]http://img507.imageshack.us/img507/3072/skillpage.png[/img] [IMG]http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/1613/banky.png[/img] [img]http://img541.imageshack.us/img541/4411/screenshot0c.png[/img][img]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/1466/screenshot1ty.png[/img][img]http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/6734/screenshot2zq.png[/img][img]http://img529.imageshack.us/img529/4408/screenshot3md.png[/img][img]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/9291/screenshot4dx.png[/img][img]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/3528/screenshot5qj.png[/img][img]http://img580.imageshack.us/img580/4447/screenshot6k.png[/img][img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/992/screenshot7aa.png[/img][img]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/7772/screenshot8o.png[/img][img]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/7051/screenshot9c.png[/img] [img]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/1560/screenshot1dm.png[/img] [img]http://img413.imageshack.us/img413/797/screenshot2pw.png[/img]

item.source: ClassicReloaded - PK based server | Custom areas & quests | Only combat skills

item.title: ClassicReloaded - PK based server | Custom areas & quests | Only combat skills
item.dc:creator: @Tepaz Tepaz
item.description:
@Tepaz wrote:

Lets start out with the small updates.

I’ve added a npc to edgeville that can adjust your attack, defense and prayer levels.
Attack and Defense can be set to levels 5, 10, 20, 30 and 40. Prayer can be set to 13,
17, 25, 31, 34, 37 and 40.
She can only adjust your level if the level is a) not lower than the level you wish to adjust it to B) not higher than 50.

I’ve also added information npc that gives out information about classicreloaded to new players.

Server message now adverts forums.

Red Dragon and Black Demon drops tweaked, they dropped far too much rune.

Diablos armor has a new look instead of being plain black.

Combat formula tweaked yet again, hopefully its alot better now.

Base prices changed for items. Meaning protect items now works in this order:
d2h, dsq, dmed, daxe/dlong, diablos, rune

Added cows & chickens to edge
Added undead ones to the old rogue hut in wild
Added moss giants east of level 12 altar
Added greater demons in lava maze and the ruins

Now for the main reason for this post: Slayer!

Some of you may know this skill from rs2. And thats how it works here as well.
There’s a new npc in edgeville that gives you tasks and once you finish them, you will get slayer experience. Max level for this skill is 150 as well.

You also get slayer points for each task you complete. these can be used to purchase items or cancel unwanted tasks. Check the combat tab for slayer information.


Slayer guild requires level 80 slayer. I won’t tell you whats in it though

Read full topic

item.title: ClassicReloaded - PK based server | Custom areas & quests | Only combat skills
item.dc:creator: @Tepaz Tepaz
item.description:
@Tepaz wrote:

Level cap has been raised to level 150. This means ive also raised XP rate accordingly.

I also added a new weapon and some new armors to the game. These have very high stat requirements (120 defense for armor, 140 attack+60 defense for weapon)

It’s up to you to figure out which mobs drop them!

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=S2QA1Q36

Read full topic

item.title: ClassicReloaded - PK based server | Custom areas & quests | Only combat skills
item.dc:creator: @Tepaz Tepaz
item.description:
@Tepaz wrote:

Client 3.0: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=MLWUZGMK

Quite a lot of new stuff in this one. I was actually going to make this resizeable but it takes a bit longer to do that. Maybe next release has that. I didnt keep a list of the changes as ive been doing them on and off but here’s the things I remember

For players:

Tweaked combat formula. It’s not a big change but it’s definitely going to right direction.

Wilderness switch. Meaning me or Brian can change the wild type from p2p to f2p with a command.

::Wild shows online players. ::Wilderness shows p2p/f2p

Added a npc that gives out F2P pking supplies

You can now run the client without having cmd prompt open.

Implemented players in view fix. it should be able to handle more players in viewing area now.

Due to last weeks mass account registering I decided to make add a register limit.
Basicly this means if you register an account you will have to wait 10 minutes
before you can register another account.

Removed ALL teleport and skilling spells.

Removed ALL original quests

Added a custom made quest! It was very fun to work on this and I will definitely add some more quests later. Its called The Labyrinth and you can start
it in Edgeville.

Added a new “town” called Pickham. It’s not as friendly as you think as it is habitated by dragons and magical beings! It is also in wilderness!

There’s also a new dungeon with few new npcs! There’s 2 routes to enter this place. Also in wilderness.

Replaced adventurers with magical pools.

Since I removed teleport spells i’m more than happy to say that edgeville store now sells law runes. People have requested them quite alot since sometimes its hard to loot in the heat of a battle!

For staff:

IP Ban system. old one was broken.

Info Command.

Bsh npc scripter. Really handy for writing scripts for new npcs and quests.

Read full topic
